pkgmetadata.longdescription: Formal Concept Analysis // Provides tools to perform fuzzy formal concept analysis, presented in Wille (1982) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-01815-2_23 and in Ganter and Obiedkov (2016) doi:10.1007/978-3-662-49291-8. It provides functions to load and save a formal context, extract its concept lattice and implications. In addition, one can use the implications to compute semantic closures of fuzzy sets and, thus, build recommendation systems.
